page.title: 18High-ways & By-ways
page.content:
Today we went to meet Mr.Morgan of {_Dyfed County Council's Highway Dept._ He told us that our block is in the Fishguard area of Pembrokshire. The Highways Dept. in that area is responsible for a total of {_____________ 700 miles ______________ of road. There is a budget of Â£1.8 million per year for each area; about 100 men are employed using 10 trucks, 25 pick_ups, 12 tractors, plus light plant rollers and compressers.
{THE COUNCIL}has to{BUDGET FOR}and{DO:_ { {A.__ High-way & By-way Maintenance ___ e.g.road-drains; hedges; weed_killing; grass cutting; salting, gritting, snow clearing in winter; emptying gullies; {B._______ Minor Improvements _________ e.g.footpaths in residential areas; visibility at junctions.
